page.title: 01NEWBIGGIN/MY HOUSE
page.content: MY{HOUSE}IS QUITE A LARGE HOUSE IT IS MADE OUT OF STONE AND HAS THREE BEDROOMS.THERE ARE TWO BEDROOMS FACING THE SEA AND ONE FACING THE BACK LANE. WHEN MY MAM WANTS HER{SHOPPING}IN SHE SENDS ME DOWN TO THE CORNER SHOP TO GET IT.THE SHOPS IN NEWBIGGIN ARE VERY NICE AND THE PEOPLE ARE VERY FRIENDLY. THERE ARE MANY DIFFERENT SHOPS IN {NEWBIGGIN}TO LOOK AT AND TO BUY FROM. MOST OF THE THINGS THAT WE NEED ARE IN NEWBIGGIN BUT I GET MY CLOTHES FROM ASHINGTON MOSTLY BECAUSE THERE ARE HARDLY ANY CLOTHES SHOPS IN NEWBIGGIN. THE OLD SHIP, THE QUEEN VICTORIA AND THE COBLE ARE SOME OF THE MANY DIFFERENT{PUBS}IN NEWBIGGIN. I DO NOT KNOW WHAT THE PUBS ARE LIKE INSIDE BECAUSE I CAN NOT GO IN TO THEM AS I AM NOT EIGHTEEN YET.
